code: @Override public void configure() throws Exception {     from("timer:hello?period={{timer.period}}").routeId("hello").routeGroup("hello-group").transform().method("myBean", "saySomething").filter(simple("${body} contains 'foo'")).to("seda:bar").end().to("stream:out").     from("seda:foo").to("log:foo").     from("seda:bar").to("log:bar"). }
